features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Drawcord hood, Stretch back neck tape for reinforcement
Drop hem for extended length and added coverage
Raglan sleeves, Thumbhole cuffs keep sleeves in place
Microfleece-lined hand-warmer kangaroo pockets, Interior pocket media port
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
